Class Terrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • Terrain
  • public class Terrain
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing a 2D array representing the terrain heights.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Terrain​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Creates the terrain object by reading in a given file

    • Constructor Detail

      • Terrain

        public Terrain​(java.lang.String fileName)
        Creates the terrain object by reading in a given file
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file which stores the heights in the terrain

    • Method Detail

      • dim

        public int dim()
        Returns the total size of the terrain.
        Returns:
        total number of elements in the grid

      • getDimX

        public int getDimX()
        Gets the x-dimensions (i.e. the number of columns in the terrain grid / the width of the terrain).
        Returns:
        the x-dimensions of the terrain

      • getDimY

        public int getDimY()
        Gets the y-dimensions (i.e. the number of rows in the terrain grid / the height of the terrain).
        Returns:
        the y-dimensions of the terrain

      • getHeight

        public float getHeight​(int x,
                       int y)
        Returns the height at a particular point in the terrain.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of point
        y - y-coordinate of point
        Returns:
        height at coordinate (x,y)

      • getImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
        Gets the greyscale image of the terrain.
        Returns:
        greyscale image of terrain

      • deriveImage

        public void deriveImage()
        Converts height values to greyscale colour and populates an image.
